title: 2019 and 2020 Full-Size Pickup Truck Rankings
text: Full-size pickups exist at the intersection of functionality, speed, technology, and fashion. Today’s trucks are as quick as some sport sedans, can practically tow your house, and offer cutting-edge convenience and safety technologies. In this market, which is contested by only six manufacturers, most buyers are predisposed to a certain brand (the domestic Big Three, in particular, carry cult followings) and it's a close fight among top competitors. That said, every one of these trucks can handle classic pickup needs without trouble, and if you haven’t already sorted yourself into the Dodge, Chevy, or Ford camps, we’ve ranked the segment players from worst to best to help you in your full-size truck search.
